channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Awful dangerous pothole on Birdlip roundabout travelling towards ullenwood turning, 12th February
item.description:
I use this road to get to Birdlip every weekday, and have used this route for 6 years. The potholes have been really really dreadful for ages but are now just unbelievable. The one I encountered today as I travelled to Leckhampton was so bad it caused my wheel to crack at the impact, I can’t see it’s damaged but cd well have cracked or weakened my alloy. I will inspect further in the daylight tmw. There is no paint on the pothole and it’s right in the wheel area of cars. I am constantly having to move into the centre of the road morning and night to avoid these potholes that are literally littering this stretch of road. There WILL be a very serious accident very soon due to so many cars going into the rd centre to avoid them. I just can’t believe you can feel it is acceptable to leave this road in this awful neglected condition. It’s a death trap for cars and people
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge overgrowing cycleway, 12th February
item.description:
All alomg this stretch of Lansdown Rd the cycle path has got badly overgrown. It is now barely wider thn a set of handlebars. Riders passing in opposite directions are using the pedestrian path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Time setting on Christ Church Road lights is 7 seconds!, 12th February
item.description:
Approaching Lansdowne Road along Christ Church Road, the traffic lights remain green for just 7 seconds no matter how many vehicles are backed up along Christ Church Road. I use this route almost every day and have had to wait three, or even four times to get through the lights. I have seen many vehicles going through on red because the wait is so long
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Talbot Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
